characters.story: The mountain of beans and wind bend down - the triumphant, victorious warrior!
"SHOOT up!" the scrooge commands sharply at the beans - standing erect, vertical like a nobody!
"YAY!" the drum and addition sing cheerfully - commending with praise for excellence!
"Hee-hee!" the mouth sings cheerfully, giggling and laughing playfully!
"Mingle?" the dish questions curiously about forming an alliance, oath and league.
"MUNG!" the fledgling sage commands sharply - Mencius the philosopher!
The pack of wild dogs bends down drooping - fierce, ferocious and violent!
"Sheng?" she questions curiously as things turn into the dish - flourishing, vigorous and prosperous!
The float bends in the dish - a small cup, lantern and lamp!
"Huh?" he questions curiously about the small box dish - a container and case.
"POOH!" she commands sharply, setting up the metal shop to spread goods.
"DOW!" the dish commands sharply - the master thief will rob and steal!
"DONG!" the dish commands sharply, swinging and swaying with oscillation!
"Ning?" she questions curiously in a calm, peaceful and tranquil way.
"Ying?" the fist questions curiously again at the dish - is it replete and full, with tears overflowing?
"Pen?" he questions curiously about the part-dish - the washbasin fire pot!
"BAY!" she sings cheerfully - there's no dish, just the trophy cup award!
"YOU need to!" he commands sharply, using flowers, thread, prisoner and dish to amass and accumulate contained wealth.
